data.title: Aoyama Gakuin University
data.meta_description: Cultivating intellectual curiosity and sharing in its rewards.
data.meta_site_name: 海外に暮らす学生のための「日本の大学への進学＆留学ガイド」 - 外国生まれの子ども、新二世、帰国生の未来を応援するサイトです
data.text:
Cultivating intellectual curiosity and sharing in its rewards.

Aoyama Campus is located within walking distance from Shibuya/Omotesando, centers for cutting-edge culture and information. The school promotes globalization and accepts international students of excellence. There are various courses taught in English that are offered, and students may take more courses in English than courses in Japanese depending on the school they enter (however, all undergraduate schools will need to take some courses in Japanese for graduation). Students of excellence can receive a scholarship of \300,000 per year. International dormitories are provided in Musashikosugi and Sagamihara to promote international relationships outside of the school campus.

AOYAMA VISION

Click here to watch more videos on their Youtube channel

Click for Open Campus Information

Support Center

International Students can receive one-on-one assistance from Tutors, Advisors and Career support staff. There will be employment support events specifically for international students. To support student life, advice on finding accomodation and psychological counselors are provided.
